GunsnStories: Bulletproof is a dynamic VR western shooter that fully immerses players into the ambiance of weird Wild West.

Stepping the tangled storyline, you will encounter many intimidating but comical enemies and fight Big Bosses.

Midlife_Game-istApr 7 at 4:23 AM
Guns n Stories - humorous wave shooter

A wave shooter that doesnt take itself seriously, in fact takes the micky out of itself for most of the time you are playing it.

Guns n Stories is a port over from PC and PSVR, so far it does not appear to have lost any of the graphical quality on other headsets. This is a cartoon style western story based shooter, that will have you smiling all the way through it.

Each of the Acts has 3 stages ending in a boss battle, the story is told by a grandfather to his grandson, fabricating the story to impress him. Each location is nicely drawn, very colourful and will keep you on your toes as enemies can come at you from either side as well as in front of you. The enemies are all nicely animated, mostly repeated through each act, adding newer ones as you progress through the game, from simple thugs with metal bars to huge thugs with rocket launches and mechanical drones. Drones..... in a western setting? I did say earlier that this game doesnt take itself seriously. It feels a little steampunk in its style.

Your weapons also range from your simple six shooter pistols to rocket launchers, tasers and machine gun style fast shooting guns, all are nicely designed and for the most part aim perfectly, on the odd occasion I did feel as if my shots werent doing any damage.

I have been playing on the normal level setting and at first you feel invincible, but quickly you find yourself turning, ducking and working out which enemy to shoot first and by act 2 I definitely felt the difficulty ramped up to make more of a challenge.

This game is perfectly priced and puts a grin on your face as Grandpa narrates all the way through with his funny one liners and quips

Limitless_VRApr 18 at 7:33 AM
A rootin', tootin' blast!

Guns 'n' Stories: Bulletproof is an arcade-style wave shooter. You play as the grandson of an old wild west gunslinger who is telling his story. You relive the story through a series of chapters, as the old man. The object here is to re-create the daring deeds that the Grandfather wants his grandson so desperately to believe....
The cartoon-style graphics are a perfect fit for the Quest, making for smooth and slick gameplay. You begin with a revolver, but soon have 2 revolvers to dual-wield with. Not long after that, you get more weapons, but also more enemies to shoot down. The enemies attack from all sides, so you need to look all around you. They also throw sticks of dynamite that you need to shoot mid-air. One of the great mechanics of the game, is the ability to beat off incoming bullets with your weapon, or dodge them. The game gets really intense and exciting as more and more enemies begin to attack! This game is a lot of fun, and i am looking forward to playing through more of the game.
